020edf162ea9b1247794d86ae9c220c3151ef2c3.query: SELECT oid FROM pg_catalog.pg_proc WHERE proname = 'user_lookup' AND pronamespace = $1

0e80d486db4dc94088cd3a06c1ce769d7c3e707c.query: GRANT EXECUTE ON FUNCTION pgbouncer.user_lookup(text) TO pgbouncer

23aa665a889a7c2293b8db14c64597f58c63445c.query: REVOKE ALL ON FUNCTION pgbouncer.user_lookup(text) FROM public, pgbouncer

3bfc2094bb77b4b1be3105d909f776f1590c91d8.query: CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS pgbouncer

63e833dee94cc40d2f10b028555e6bc4faef2dad.query: CREATE USER pgbouncer WITH LOGIN NOSUPERUSER NOCREATEROLE NOCREATEDB NOREPLICATION NOBYPASSRLS

757e16b2183de2d582090116df4a22b1a71c2810.query:
SELECT
    r.rolname as "username!",
    r.rolcanlogin as "can_login!",
    r.rolcreatedb as "create_db!",
    r.rolcreaterole as "create_role!",
    r.rolbypassrls as "bypass_rls!",
    r.rolsuper as "superuser!"
FROM pg_catalog.pg_roles r
WHERE r.rolname = $1;

a8763a5d11127a6becab4718e1c5eec7e1c1e841.query: SELECT oid FROM pg_catalog.pg_namespace WHERE nspname = 'pgbouncer'

bc526e442532558557f425a39a5bf22c9fcfcd36.query: SELECT oid FROM pg_catalog.pg_database WHERE datname = $1

e8dc0b693e9d8a1f6ff56585c89b109655ba1d7e.query: GRANT USAGE ON SCHEMA pgbouncer TO pgbouncer
